S092.Q1. WHAT IS YOUR ARMY RANK OR GRAD?  1. PRIVATE OR PRIVATE FIRST CLASS 2. CORPORAL OR TECHNICIAN 5TH GRADE 3. SERGEANT OR TECHNICIAN 4TH GRADE 4. STAFF SERGEANT OR TECHNICIAN 3RD GRADE 5. TECHNICAL SERGEANT, MASTER SERGEANT, OR FIRST SERGEANT 6. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA
S092.Q2. HOW OLD WERE YOU ON YOUR LAST BIRTHDA?  1. 20 YEARS OR YOUNGER 2. 21 TO 25 YEARS 3. 26 TO 30 YEARS 4. 31 TO 35 YEARS 5. 36 YEARS OR MORE 6. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S092.Q3. HOW FAR DID YOU GO IN SCHOO?  1. LESS THAN 6TH GRADE 2. FINISHED 6TH GRADE 3. FINISHED 7TH GRADE 4. FINISHED 8TH GRADE 5. SOME HIGH SCHOOL BUT DID NOT FINISH 6. GRADUATED FROM HIGH SCHOOL 7. SOME COLLEGE BUT DID NOT FINISH 8. GRADUATED FROM COLLEGE 0. NO ANSWER

S092.Q4. IN WHAT STATE DID YOU SPEND MOST OF THE LAST FIVE YEARS OF YOUR CIVILIAN LIFE BEFORE YOU CAME INTO THE ARM? E. SECTION:  1. NEW ENGLAND 2. MIDDLE ATLANTIC 3. EAST NORTH CENTRAL 4. WEST NORTH CENTRAL 5. SOUTH ATLANTIC 6. EAST SOUTH CENTRAL 7. WEST SOUTH CENTRAL 8. MOUNTAIN 9. PACIFIC 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S092.Q5. WHERE WERE YOU LIVING MOST OF THE LAST FIVE YEARS OF YOUR CIVILIAN LIFE BEFORE YOU CAME INTO THE ARM?  1. ON A FARM OR IN THE COUNTRY 2. IN A SMALL TOWN (FEWER THAN 2,500 PEOPLE) 3. IN A TOWN (WITH BETWEEN 2,500 AND 25,000 PEOPLE) 4. IN A CITY (BETWEEN 25,000 AND 100,000 PEOPLE) 5. IN A LARGE CITY (MORE THAN 100,000 PEOPLE) 0. NO ANSWER
S092.Q6. ARE YOU:  1. SINGLE, AND NOT ENGAGED 2. SINGLE, BUT AM ENGAGED 3. MARRIED BEFORE ENTERING ARMY 4. MARRIED AFTER ENTERING ARMY 5. WIDOWED, DIVORCED, OR SEPARATED 0. NO ANSWER
S092.Q7. HOW LONG HAVE YOU BEEN IN THE ARM?  1. LESS THAN 6 MONTHS 2. 6 MONTHS TO 1 YEAR 3. 1 YEAR TO 18 MONTHS 4. 18 MONTHS TO 2 YEARS 5. OVER 2 YEARS 0. NO ANSWER
S092.Q8. HOW LONG HAVE YOU BEEN IN THE BRITISH ISLE?  1. LESS THAN 3 MONTHS 2. 3 MONTHS TO 6 MONTHS 3. 6 MONTHS TO 1 YEAR 4. 1 YEAR TO 18 MONTHS 5. OVER 18 MONTHS 6. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S092.Q9. WHAT BRANCH OF THE ARMY ARE YOU IN NO?  01. AIR CORPS 02. ARMORED FORCE 03. ARTILLERY 04. ENGINEERS 05. INFANTRY 06. MEDICAL DEPARTMENT 07. MILITARY POLICE 08. QUARTERMASTER CORPS 09. TRANSPORTATION CORPS 10. ORDNANCE DEPARTMENT, SIGNAL CORPS, CHEMICAL WARFARE SERVICE 11. OTHER 12. AIR COMBAT 00. NO ANSWER
S092.Q10. ON THE WHOLE, HOW DO YOU FEEL ABOUT THE ARM?  1. I LIKE THE ARMY VERY MUCH 2. I LIKE IT FAIRLY WELL 3. I RATHER DISLIKE IT 4. I DISLIKE THE ARMY VERY MUCH 0. NO ANSWER

S092.Q11. DO YOU THINK YOU MIGHT WANT TO STAY IN THE ARMY AFTER THE WA?  1. YES, I WOULD WANT TO VERY MUCH 2. YES, I MIGHT WANT TO BUT I'M NOT SURE 3. NO, I DON'T THINK I WOULD WANT TO 4. NO, I WOULD NOT WANT TO AT ALL 5. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S092.Q12. AFTER THE WAR, DO YOU THINK THE UNITED STATES COULD HAVE AN ARMY LARGE ENOUGH FOR THE COUNTRY'S NEEDS BY TAKING VOLUNTEERS ONL?  1. YES, I THINK IT COULD 2. NO, I DO NOT THINK IT COULD 3. UNDECIDED 4. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S092.Q13. AFTER THE WAR, DO YOU THINK THE UNITED STATES SHOULD DRAFT ALL YOUNG MEN FOR A CERTAIN AMOUNT OF ARMY TRAINING DURING PEACETIME OR SHOULD WE GO BACK TO THE REGULAR ARMY SYSTEM OF TAKING VOLUNTEERS ONL?  1. DRAFT ALL YOUNG MEN FOR A CERTAIN AMOUNT OF TRAINING 2. GO BACK TO TAKING VOLUNTEERS ONLY 3. UNDECIDED 4. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S092.Q14. WHICH OF THE FOLLOWING REASONS COMES CLOSEST TO SAYING WHY YOU THINK THE UNITED STATES SHOULD DRAFT ALL YOUNG MEN FOR A CERTAIN AMOUNT OF ARMY TRAINING DURING PEACETIM?  1. BECAUSE I THINK THE ARMY EXPERIENCE IS WORTHWHILE FOR YOUNG MEN 2. BECAUSE I THINK IT IS NECESSARY FOR THE SAFETY OF THE UNITED STATES 3. BECAUSE I THINK IT IS BOTH WORTHWHILE FOR YOUNG MEN AND NECESSARY FOR THE SAFETY OF THE UNITED STATES 4. FOR SOME OTHER REASON 5. I THINK THE UNITED STATES SHOULD GO BACK TO TAKING VOLUNTEERS ONLY 6. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S092.Q15. IF ALL YOUNG MEN IN THE UNITED STATES WERE TO BE GIVEN MILITARY TRAINING, AT ABOUT WHAT AGE DO YOU THINK THIS TRAINING SHOULD BEGI?  1. BEFORE 18 YEARS OF AGE 2. AT 18 YEARS OF AGE 3. AT 19 YEARS OF AGE 4. AT 20 YEARS OF AGE 5. AT 21 YEARS OF AGE 6. AFTER 21 YEARS OF AGE 0. NO ANSWER

S092.Q16. IF ALL YOUNG MEN IN THE UNITED STATES WERE TO BE GIVEN MILITARY TRAINING FOR ABOUT HOW LONG A TIME DO YOU THINK THIS TRAINING SHOULD LAS?  1. ABOUT 6 MONTHS 2. ABOUT 1 YEAR 3. ABOUT 1 1/2 YEARS 4. ABOUT 2 YEARS 5. MORE THAN 2 YEARS 0. NO ANSWER

S092.Q17. ON THE WHOLE, DO YOU THINK THE ARMY IS GIVING YOU A CHANCE TO SHOW WHAT YOU CAN D?  1. A VERY GOOD CHANCE 2. A FAIRLY GOOD CHANCE 3. NOT MUCH OF A CHANCE 4. NO CHANCE AT ALL 5. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER
S092.Q18. ON THE WHOLE, HOW IS THE MORALE OF THE MEN IN YOUR OUTFI?  1. VERY HIGH 2. FAIRLY HIGH 3. JUST SO-SO 4. FAIRLY LOW 5. VERY LOW 0. NO ANSWER
S092.Q19. DO YOU FEEL PROUD OF YOUR COMPANY (BATTERY, SQUADRON, TROOP)*  1. YES, VERY PROUD 2. YES, FAIRLY PROUD 3. NO, NOT PROUD 4. UNDECIDED 5. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA
S092.Q20. HOW MANY OF THE MEN IN YOUR OUTFIT WOULD YOU SAY ARE GOOD ALL-AROUND SOLDIER?  1. ALL ARE 2. MOST ARE 3. ABOUT HALF ARE, HALF ARE NOT 4. ONLY A FEW ARE 5. ALMOST NONE ARE 0. NO ANSWER

S092.Q21. IN GENERAL, HOW WOULD YOU SAY YOU FEEL MOST OF THE TIME, IN GOOD SPIRITS OR IN LOW SPIRIT?  1. I AM USUALLY IN GOOD SPIRITS 2. I AM IN GOOD SPIRITS SOME OF THE TIME AND IN LOW SPIRITS SOME OF THE TIME 3. I AM USUALLY IN LOW SPIRITS 0. NO ANSWER
S092.Q22. DO YOU USALLY FEEL THAT WHAT YOU ARE DOING IN THE ARMY IS WORTHWHILE OR NO?  1. I USUALLY FEEL IT IS NOT WORTHWHILE 2. I USUALLY FEEL IT IS WORTHWHILE 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S092.Q23. WOULD YOU SAY THAT MOST OF THE MEN IN YOUR OUTFIT USUALLY PUT ALL THEY HAVE INTO THEIR ARMY DUTIES AND TRAINING, OR DO THEY USUALLY WORK JUST HARD ENOUGH TO GET B?  1. MOST OF THE MEN USUALLY PUT ALL THEY HAVE INTO IT 2. MOST OF THE MEN USUALLY WORK JUST HARD ENOUGH TO GET BY 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S092.Q24. HOW ABOUT YOU YOURSELF - WOULD YOU HONESTLY SAY THAT YOU USUALLY PUT ALL YOU HAVE INTO YOUR ARMY DUTIES AND TRAINING OR DO YOU USUALLY WORK JUST HARD ENOUGH TO GET B?  1. I USUALLY PUT ALL I HAVE INTO IT 2. I USUALLY WORK JUST HARD ENOUGH TO GET BY 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S092.Q25. WHICH OF THE FOLLOWING STATEMENTS BEST TELLS THE WAY YOU FEEL ABOUT GETTING INTO AN ACTUAL BATTLE ZON?  1. I WANT VERY MUCH TO GET INTO IT JUST AS SOON AS POSSIBLE 2. I'M READY TO GO ANYTIME 3. I'D LIKE TO GO BEFORE IT'S OVER BUT I DON'T THINK I'M READY YET 4. I HOPE I WON'T HAVE TO GO, BUT IF I DO, I THINK I'LL DO ALL RIGHT 5. I HOPE I WON'T HAVE TO GO BECAUSE I DON'T THINK I WOULD DO VERY WELL 0. NO ANSWER
S092.Q26. DO YOU FEEL THAT EVERYTHING POSSIBLE HAS BEEN DONE TO PLACE YOU IN THE ARMY JOB WHERE YOU BEST FI?  1. YES 2. NO 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER
S092.Q27. WOULD YOU CHANGE TO SOME OTHER ARMY JOB IF GIVEN A CHANC?  1. YES 2. NO 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S092.Q28. HOW DO YOU FEEL ABOUT THE NON-COMS THAT HAVE BEEN PICKED FROM YOUR OUTFI?  1. THEY ARE THE BEST ONES THAT COULD HAVE BEEN PICKED 2. THEY ARE AS GOOD AS ANY THAT COULD HAVE BEEN PICKED 3. SOMEWHAT BETTER ONES COULD HAVE BEEN PICKED 4. MUCH BETTER ONES COULD HAVE BEEN PICKED 5. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S092.Q29. HOW MANY OF THE OFFICERS OF YOUR OUTFIT ARE THE KIND WHO ARE WILLING TO GO THROUGH ANYTHING THEY ASK THEIR MEN TO GO THROUG?  1. ALL OF THEM ARE 2. MOST OF THEM ARE 3. ABOUT HALF OF THEM ARE 4. FEW OF THEM ARE 5. NONE OF THEM ARE 6. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S092.Q30. HOW MANY OF YOUR OFFICERS TAKE A PERSONAL INTEREST IN THEIR ME?  1. ALL OF THEM DO 2. MOST OF THEM DO 3. ABOUT HALF OF THEM DO 4. FEW OF THEM DO 5. NONE OF THEM DO 6. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S092.Q31. UP TO NOW HAS THE WAR MADE THINGS BETTER OR WORSE FOR YOUR FAMILY AND FRIENDS BACK HOME (SUCH THINGS AS JOBS, PAY, AND LIVING CONDITIONS)*  1. THINGS ARE A LOT BETTER 2. THINGS ARE A LITTLE BETTER, BUT NOT MUCH 3. I DON'T SEE ANY DIFFERENCE 4. THINGS ARE A LITTLE WORSE 5. THINGS ARE A LOT WORSE 6. DON'T KNOW 7. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S092.Q32A. CONSIDERING WHAT EACH OF THESE COUNTRIES COULD DO, WHICH ONE DO YOU THINK IS TRYING HARDEST TO WIN THE WA?  1. ENGLAND 2. RUSSIA 3. CHINA 4. UNITED STATES 5. DON'T KNOW 6. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA
S092.Q32B. NOW, WHICH ONE DO YOU THINK IS TRYING NEXT HARDEST TO WI?  1. ENGLAND 2. RUSSIA 3. CHINA 4. UNITED STATES 5. DON'T KNOW 6. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S092.Q33A. ABOUT HOW MUCH LONGER DO YOU THINK THE WAR WILL LAST WITH GERMAN?  01. LESS THAN 6 MONTHS, IN 1943 OR "BY SPRING" 02. 6 MONTHS, BUT LESS THAN 1 YEAR, IN 1944 03. 1 YEAR 04. OVER 1 YEAR, BUT LESS THAN 2 YEARS, IN 1945 05. 2 YEARS 06. OVER 2 YEARS BUT LESS THAN 3 YEARS, 1946 07. 3 YEARS 08. OVER 3 YEARS, IN 1947 OR LATER 09. INDEFINITE ANSWER "SHORT TIME" 10. INDEFINITE ANSWER "LONG TIME" 11. INDEFINITE ANSWER "NO TIME GIVEN" 12. NO ANSWER 00. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S092.Q33B. ABOUT HOW MUCH LONGER DO YOU THINK THE WAR WILL LAST WITH JAPA?  01. LESS THAN 6 MONTHS, IN 1943 OR "BY SPRING" 02. 6 MONTHS, BUT LESS THAN 1 YEAR, IN 1944 03. 1 YEAR 04. OVER 1 YEAR, BUT LESS THAN 2 YEARS, IN 1945 05. 2 YEARS 06. OVER 2 YEARS BUT LESS THAN 3 YEARS, 1946 07. 3 YEARS 08. OVER 3 YEARS, IN 1947 OR LATER 09. INDEFINITE ANSWER "SHORT TIME" 10. INDEFINITE ANSWER "LONG TIME" 11. INDEFINITE ANSWER "NO TIME GIVEN" 12. NO ANSWER 00. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S092.Q34. WHICH DO YOU THINK WOULD BE THE BEST WAY FOR THE UNITED STATES TO KEEP OUT OF WAR IN THE FUTUR?  1. STAY OUT OF WORLD AFFAIRS 2. JOIN A STRONG ORGANIZATION OF NATIONS 3. ISOLATIONISTS PLAN: "TAKE NEITHER SIDE UNTIL FORCED INTO FOREIGN AFFAIRS," "MIND HER OWN BUSINESS," AND, "AVOID COMPLICATIONS" 4. IMPERIALIST PLAN: "LARGE ARMY TO TERRIORIZE ANY COUNTRY WHO STARTS TROUBLE," "DOMINATE ALL OTHER PEOPLES," "CONTROL BALANCE OF POWER," "PEACE-POWER TREATY" 5. INTERNATIONALIST PLAN: "CO-OPERATE WITH ENGLAND AND RUSSIA," "EDUCATION AND A SINGLE WORLD-WIDE GOVERNMENT," "PACT WITH BRITAIN" 6. SOME OTHER PLAN, NO PLAN, OR UNCLASSIFIED: "CAN'T - NO USE ANYWAY," "MAKE STRONG PEACE," "WIPE OUT PRESENT ENEMIES," "NO WAY TO STAY OUT OF WAR," "LET LEADERS DECIDE," "WIPE OUT ENEMIES" 7. UNDECIDED: "HARD TO SAY," "TIME WILL TELL, "DON'T KNOW - IT'S HARD" 8. PREPAREDNESS PLAN: "PREPAREDNESS," "LARGE ARMY, NAVY AND AIR FORCE," "GOOD ARMY AND RESERVES," "STAYING STRONG" 9. DISARMAMENT PLAN: "PREVENT ARMING OF NATIONS," "DISARM ALL OTHER COUNTRIES," "DISARM ENEMIES WITH STRONG FORCE," "PREVENT ENEMIES FROM RISING" 0. NO ANSWER
S092.Q35A. "AFTER THE WAR THE UNITED STATES SHOULD CONTROL AND DOMINATE THE WORLD"*  1. AGREE 2. DISAGREE 3. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA
S092.Q35B. "AFTER THE WAR THE UNITED STATES SHOULD STAY OUT OF WORLD AFFAIRS AND STICK TO THE PROBLEMS WE HAVE IN OUR OWN COUNTRY"*  1. AGREE 2. DISAGREE 3. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA
S092.Q35C. "AFTER THE WAR THE NATIONS OF THE WORLD SHOULD SET UP A STRONG INTERNATIONAL ORGANIZATION"*  1. AGREE 2. DISAGREE 3. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S092.Q35D. "AFTER THE WAR THE UNITED STATES SHOULD JOIN A STRONG INTERNATIONAL ORGANIZATION OF NATIONS EVEN IF IT MEANT THAT THIS ORGANIZATION WOULD HAVE SOME CONTROL OVER HOW THE UNITED STATES DEALS WITH OTHER COUNTRIES"*  1. AGREE 2. DISAGREE 3. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA
S092.Q35E. "AFTER THE WAR THERE SHOULD BE AN INTERNATIONALLY CONTROLLED ARMY TO POLICE THE WORLD"*  1. AGREE 2. DISAGREE 3. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S092.Q36. WHEN THE WAR IS OVER DO YOU THINK THE ARMY SHOULD RELEASE ALL SOLDIERS BACK TO CIVILIAN LIFE AS SOON AS POSSIBLE OR SHOULD IT RELEASE THEM ONLY WHEN THERE ARE JOBS FOR THE?  1. RELEASE MEN ONLY WHEN THERE ARE JOBS FOR THEM 2. RELEASE MEN AS SOON AS POSSIBLE WHETHER THERE ARE JOBS FOR THEM OR NOT 3. UNDECIDED 4. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S092.Q37A. AFTER THE WAR WHEN THE ARMY STARTS RELEASING SOLDIERS BACK TO CIVILIAN LIFE, WHICH OF THESE TWO GROUPS OF MEN DO YOU THINK SHOULD BE RELEASED FIRS?  1. MEN WITH DEPENDENTS 2. MEN OVER THIRTY YEARS OF AGE 3. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA
S092.Q37B. WHICH OF THESE TWO GROUPS OF MEN DO YOU THINK SHOULD BE RELEASED FIRS?  1. MEN WHO HAVE BEEN IN THE ARMY LONGEST 2. MEN WITH DEPENDENTS 3. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA
S092.Q37C. WHICH OF THESE TWO GROUPS OF MEN DO YOU THINK SHOULD BE RELEASED FIRS?  1. MEN OVER THIRTY YEARS OF AGE 2. MEN WHO HAVE SERVED OVERSEAS 3. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA
S092.Q37D. WHICH OF THESE TWO GROUPS OF MEN DO YOU THINK SHOULD BE RELEASED FIRS?  1. MEN WHO HAVE SERVED OVERSEAS 2. MEN WHO HAVE BEEN IN THE ARMY LONGEST 3. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA
S092.Q37E. WHICH OF THESE TWO GROUPS OF MEN DO YOU THINK SHOULD BE RELEASED FIRS?  1. MEN OVER THIRTY YEARS OF AGE 2. MEN WHO HAVE BEEN IN THE ARMY LONGEST 3. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA
S092.Q37F. WHICH OF THESE TWO GROUPS OF MEN DO YOU THINK SHOULD BE RELEASED FIRS?  1. MEN WITH DEPENDENTS 2. MEN WHO HAVE SERVED OVERSEAS 3. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA
S092.Q38. DO YOU THINK THERE IS SOME OTHER GROUP OF SOLDIERS BESIDES THOSE LISTED IN QUESTION 37 THAT SHOULD BE LET OUT OF THE ARMY FIRS?  1. YES 2. NO 3. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S092.Q39. AFTER THE WAR DO YOU THINK SOLDIERS SHOULD BE GIVEN FIRST CHOICE OF THE JOBS THAT ARE OPEN OR DO YOU THINK EVERYBODY SHOULD HAVE AN EQUAL CHANCE TO GET JOB?  1. SOLDIERS SHOULD GET FIRST CHOICE 2. EVERYBODY SHOULD HAVE AN EQUAL CHANCE 3. UNDECIDED 4. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S092.Q40. HOW CLEAR AN IDEA DO YOU HAVE AS TO WHY WE ARE FIGHTING THIS WA?  1. I HAVE A VERY CLEAR IDEA 2. I HAVE A FAIRLY CLEAR IDEA 3. I AM NOT SO CLEAR 4. I AM NOT AT ALL CLEAR 5. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA
S092.Q41. DO YOU FEEL THAT MOST OF THE MEN IN YOUR OUTFIT HAVE A FULL UNDERSTANDING OF WHY WE ARE FIGHTING THIS WA?  1. YES 2. NO 3. UNDECIDED 4. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA
S092.Q42. DO YOU THINK YOU HAVE AS MUCH OF A PERSONAL STAKE IN THIS WAR AS ANYBODY ELS?  1. YES 2. I THINK SO, BUT I'M NOT SURE 3. NO 4. UNDECIDED 5. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA
S092.Q43. DO YOU EVER GET THE FEELING THAT THIS WAR IS NOT WORTH FIGHTIN?  1. VERY OFTEN 2. SOMETIMES 3. ONLY ONCE IN A GREAT WHILE 4. NEVER 5. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S092.Q44. HOW IMPORTANT IS IT TO YOU PERSONALLY TO HAVE A CLEAR UNDERSTANDING OF WHY WE ARE FIGHTING THIS WA?  1. IT IS ABSOLUTELY NECESSARY 2. IT IS OF GREAT IMPORTANCE 3. IT IS OF MEDIUM IMPORTANCE 4. IT IS OF LITTLE IMPORTANCE 5. IT IS OF NO IMPORTANCE AT ALL 6. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S092.Q45. IN YOUR OPINION, HOW MANY OF THE MEN IN YOUR OUTFIT ARE REALLY INTERESTED IN KNOWING MORE ABOUT WHY WE ARE FIGHTING, AND WHAT OUR AIMS IN THE WAR AR?  1. ALMOST ALL OF THEM 2. MOST OF THEM 3. ABOUT HALF OF THEM 4. LESS THAN HALF 5. VERY FEW OF THEM 6. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA X. REPLACEMENT AND RECEPTION DEPOT SAMPLE NOT ASKED QUESTIONS 46-70.
S092.Q46A. HAVE YOU HAD ANY OF THESE "ARMY TALKS" DISCUSSION MEETINGS IN YOUR OUTFI?  1. YES, ONE OR TWO 2. YES, THREE OR MORE 3. NO 9. INAPPLICABLE, NO ANSWER F. IF NOT SKIP TO QUESTION 46H.

S092.Q46B. DO YOU PERSONALLY FIND THESE "ARMY TALKS" DISCUSSION MEETINGS WORTHWHILE, OR NO?  1. VERY MUCH WORTHWHILE 2. I THINK THEY WILL BE WORTHWHILE, BUT AM NOT SURE 3. I DOUBT IF THEY WILL BE WORTHWHILE 4. I THINK THEY ARE A WASTE OF TIME 9. INAPPLICABLE, NO ANSWER

S092.Q46C. IN YOUR OPINION ABOUT HOW MANY OF THE MEN IN YOUR OUTFIT REALLY GET ANY GOOD OUT OF THE "ARMY TALKS" MEETING?  1. ALMOST ALL OF THEM 2. MOST OF THEM 3. ABOUT HALF OF THEM 4. LESS THAN HALF 5. VERY FEW 9. INAPPLICABLE, NO ANSWER
S092.Q46D. HOW GOOD A JOB HAVE YOUR DISCUSSION LEADERS DONE SO FA?  1. VERY GOOD 2. FAIRLY GOOD 3. NOT SO GOOD 4. VERY POOR 9. INAPPLICABLE, NO ANSWER
S092.Q46E. WOULD YOU PREFER HAVING AN OFFICER OR A NON-COM AS A DISCUSSION LEADE?  1. AN OFFICER 2. A NON-COM 3. IT MAKES NO DIFFERENCE 9. INAPPLICABLE, NO ANSWER X. QUESTION 46F NOT CODED.

S092.Q46G. WHAT DO YOU THINK OF THE CHOICE OF SUBJECTS FOR DISCUSSION SO FA? HAVE THEY BEEN GOOD TOPICS, OR NO?  1. VERY GOOD 2. FAIRLY GOOD 3. NOT SO GOOD 4. VERY POOR 9. INAPPLICABLE, NO ANSWER X. QUESTION 46H NOT CODED.

S092.Q47A. HOW MUCH HAVE YOU ALREADY HEARD ABOUT THESE SHORT COURSES AT BRITISH UNIVERSITIE?  1. NOTHING, THIS IS THE FIRST I HAD HEARD ABOUT THEM 2. I HAD HEARD SOMETHING ABOUT THEM, BUT PAID NO PARTICULAR ATTENTION 3. I ALREADY HAVE A PRETTY GOOD IDEA OF WHAT THE COURSES ARE AND HOW THEY OPERATE 0. NO ANSWER 9. INAPPLICABLE, NO CODE OR NO DATA

S092.Q47B. IF YOU COULD GET A WEEK'S FURLOUGH, WOULD YOU WANT TO SPEND IT ATTENDING ONE OF THESE COURSES, OR WOULD YOU RATHER DO SOMETHING ELS?  1. I AM SURE I WOULD WANT TO ATTEND A COURSE IF IT COULD BE ARRANGED 2. I MIGHT WANT TO, BUT AM NOT SURE 3. I DOUBT IF I WOULD CARE TO 4. I AM SURE THAT I WOULD NOT WANT TO SPEND A FURLOUGH ATTENDING SUCH A COURSE 0. NO ANSWER 9. INAPPLICABLE, NO CODE OR NO DATA

S092.Q48. HOW GOOD A JOB DO YOU THINK THE ARMY IS DOING IN KEEPING THE SOLDIERS IN THIS STATION UP-TO-DATE ON THE NEWS OF THE DA?  1. VERY GOOD 2. FAIRLY GOOD JOB 3. PRETTY POOR JOB 4. VERY POOR JOB 5. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER 9. INAPPLICABLE, NO CODE OR NO DATA

S092.Q49. HOW WOULD YOU RATE YOURSELF WITH REGARD TO A KNOWLEDGE OF WORLD EVENTS AND RECENT NEW?  1. HAVE A FAIRLY COMPLETE AND UP-TO-DATE KNOWLEDGE 2. HAVE A GENERAL KNOWLEDGE OF "HEADLINE" EVENTS 3. DO NOT KEEP UP WITH THE NEWS 0. NO ANSWER 9. INAPPLICABLE, NO CODE OR NO DATA

S092.Q50. IN GENERAL, WOULD YOU SAY THAT YOU KEEP UP WITH THE NEWS MORE CLOSELY NOW, ABOUT THE SAME, OR LESS CLOSELY NOW THAN YOU DID BEFORE YOU CAME INTO THE ARM?  1. I KEEP UP MORE CLOSELY NOW 2. I KEEP UP ABOUT THE SAME 3. I KEEP UP LESS CLOSELY NOW 0. NO ANSWER 9. INAPPLICABLE, NO CODE OR NO DATA

S092.Q51. WHAT DO YOU THINK IS THE MAIN REASON YOU DO NOT KEEP UP MORE CLOSELY WITH THE NEW?  1. I HAVE LESS INTEREST IN THE NEWS NOW 2. I DON'T HAVE ANY GOOD WAY OF GETTING THE NEWS 3. I JUST DON'T HAVE TIME TO KEEP UP WITH THE NEWS 4. I DO KEEP UP CLOSELY WITH THE NEWS 0. NO ANSWER 9. INAPPLICABLE, NO CODE OR NO DATA X. COL. 80 NOT USED. CARD 2

YES, THEY ALWAYS COME IN WELL 2. YES, SOME OF THE TIME 3. NO, WE CANNOT GET THEM 4. I DON'T KNOW 0. NO ANSWER 9. INAPPLICABLE, NO CODE OR NO DATA

S092.Q60. WHAT SORT OF OPINION DO YOU THINK MOST AMERICAN SOLDIERS HAVE OF THE ENGLISH PEOPL?  1. VERY FAVORABLE 2. FAIRLY FAVORABLE 3. RATHER UNFAVORABLE 4. VERY UNFAVORABLE 0. NO ANSWER 9. INAPPLICABLE, NO CODE OR NO DATA

S092.Q62. HAS YOUR OPINION OF THE ENGLISH PEOPLE CHANGED FROM WHAT IT WAS BEFORE YOU CAME TO ENGLAN?  1. IT IS MUCH HIGHER THAN IT WAS 2. IT IS SOMEWHAT HIGHER THAN IT WAS 3. IT HAS NOT CHANGED ONE WAY OR THE OTHER 4. IT IS A BIT LOWER THAN IT WAS 5. IT IS MUCH LOWER THAN IT WAS 0. NO ANSWER 9. INAPPLICABLE, NO CODE OR NO DATA
